dt2.10:1.1_2: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?
dt2.10:1.2_0: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:2.5_0: manāyatanena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …pe…
dt2.10:2.6_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:3.4_0: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyā ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:3.5_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:4.4_0: maggasaccena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:4.5_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:5.5_0: purisindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:5.6_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:6.1_0: Manindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:6.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:7.4_0: domanassindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:7.5_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:8.1_0: Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:8.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:9.10_0: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:9.11_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:10.3_0: phassapaccayā vedanāya ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:10.4_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:11.3_0: kammabhavena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:11.4_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:12.1_0: Rūpabhavena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:12.2_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:13.3_0: paridevena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:13.4_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:14.16_0: ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:14.17_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:15.6_0: manasikārena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:15.7_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:16.1_0: Adhimokkhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:16.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:17.2_0: akusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:17.3_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:18.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:18.2_0: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:18.3_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:19.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
dt2.10:19.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:20.1_0: Vipākehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:20.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:21.2_0: saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:21.3_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:22.2_0: anupādinnupādāniyehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:22.3_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:23.2_0: asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:23.3_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:24.1_0: Savitakkasavicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:24.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:25.2_0: pītisahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:25.3_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:26.1_0: Avitakkaavicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:26.2_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.
dt2.10:27.1_0: Sukhasahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:27.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:28.1_0: Upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:28.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:29.9_0: mahaggatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:29.10_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:30.2_0: paṇītehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:30.3_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā. –12
dt2.10:31.1_0: Parittārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:31.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:32.8_0: maggādhipatīhi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:32.9_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:33.1_0: Anuppannehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:33.2_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:34.2_0: anāgatārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:34.3_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:35.4_0: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:35.5_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:36.2_0: anidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:36.3_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:37.4_0: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:37.5_0: sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:37.6_0: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:37.7_0: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:37.8_0: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:37.9_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:38.5_0: rūpīhi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:38.6_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:39.1_0: Lokuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:39.2_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:40.3_0: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:40.4_0: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:40.5_0: āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
dt2.10:40.6_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:41.2_0: āsavavippayuttehi anāsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:41.3_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:42.8_0: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:42.9_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:43.2_0: parāmāsavippayuttehi aparāmaṭṭhehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
dt2.10:43.3_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:44.9_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:45.4_0: upādādhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:45.5_0: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:46.1_0: Anupādinnehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:46.2_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:47.5_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:47.6_0: kilesehi ceva saṅkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:47.7_0: saṅkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:47.8_0: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.10:47.9_0: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
dt2.10:47.10_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:48.2_0: kilesavippayuttehi asaṅkilesikehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā,
dt2.10:48.3_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:49.4_0: bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:49.5_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.10:51.3_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.
dt2.10:52.2_0: pītisahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:52.3_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:53.1_0: Sukhasahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:53.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:54.1_0: Upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:54.2_0: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.10:55.3_0: anuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …
dt2.10:55.4_0: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.10:56.5_2: te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?
dt2.10:56.6_0: Te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
